column5: Population | tax unit | Population | Adults | population
column6: Population | individuals | Population | All Ages | population
column7: Number of tax returns | tax unit | Population | Adults | population
column8: National income price index | individuals | Indices | All Ages | population
column9: PPP conversion factor, LCU per EUR | individuals | Exchange rates | All Ages | local currency per foreign currency
column10: Market exchange rate, LCU per EUR | individuals | Exchange rates | All Ages | local currency per foreign currency
column11: PPP conversion factor, LCU per USD | individuals | Exchange rates | All Ages | local currency per foreign currency
column12: Market exchange rate, LCU per USD | individuals | Exchange rates | All Ages | local currency per foreign currency
column13: PPP conversion factor, LCU per CNY | individuals | Exchange rates | All Ages | local currency per foreign currency
column14: Market exchange rate, LCU per CNY | individuals | Exchange rates | All Ages | local currency per foreign currency

column5: Number of individuals in a group. The population is comprised of individuals over age 20. The base unit is the tax unit defined by national fiscal administrations to measure personal income taxes.
column6: Number of individuals in a group. The population is comprised of individuals of all ages. The base unit is the individual (rather than the household). This is equivalent to assuming no sharing of resources within couples.
column7: Number of reports filed containing information used to calculate taxes. The population is comprised of individuals over age 20. The base unit is the tax unit defined by national fiscal administrations to measure personal income taxes.
column8: Current national income adjusted by CPI, divided by national income of the base year adjusted by CPI. It measures the changes in the purchasing power of national income.
column9: PPP conversion factor of curent local currency to current PPP EUR.
column10: Official exchange rate of the local currency to EUR.
column11: PPP conversion factor of current local currency to current USD.
column12: Official exchange rate of the local currency to USD.
column13: PPP conversion factor of current local currency to current PPP CNY.
column14: Official exchange rate of the local currency to CNY.

column5: WID.world computations using: Frank, Sommeiller, Price & Saez (2015)
